extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to excessive desires for sensual pleasure
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, giving in to excessive desires for sensual pleasure?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: over my family 's needs or essential expenses
prodigality.question: Have I used excessive and wasteful financial resources to prioritize my personal interests over my family's needs or essential expenses?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: over essential financial obligations to family members
prodigality.question: Have I excessively prioritized my own leisure activities over essential financial obligations to family members in need?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in prioritizing recreational activities over essential financial responsibilities
prodigality.question: Have I been excessive and wasteful in prioritizing recreational activities over essential financial responsibilities, potentially harming my ability to support myself and those in need?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in a way that brought me pleasure or made me feel superior
gossip.question: Have I shared others' private affairs, even if true, in a way that brought me pleasure or made me feel superior?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in spreading rumors or untruths about others through conversation
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in spreading rumors or untruths about others through conversation, even if they were seemingly harmless?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I entertained myself by sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: by doing something on Sunday when it could have waited until Monday
impiety.question: Did I give in to worldly demands by doing something on Sunday when it could have waited until Monday?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
